title: Bonnie the Bunny

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Visit a player and bash them with your guitar
- Once per game, you can stuff a player into a Freddy Fazbear suit. This is an Overkill attack.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You may only bash another player's head in with a guitar 3 times.
- If you attempt to bash a good player's head in, you will fail the attack and lose the ability to attack again.
- If you attempt to stuff another good player into a Freddy Fazbear suit, you will be shut down (modkilled) as soon as the day starts. Your target will not only survive, but also gain your attributes and remaining charges.

desc:
Post 4410
He can't teleport, but he'll surely leave you fowa dead
